MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have arrived onsite and are continuing our patrols for a fault on the overhead line network. We now expect your supply to be restored by 3:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:33am on Wednesday, 17 March 2021
